alert.note: Alert for Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 11:24PM CDT until April 26 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Southwestern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kemp, or 9 miles southeast of Kaufman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Mabank, Kemp, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Myrtle Springs, Rand, Whitton, Becker, Phalba, Roddy, Jackson, Wise, Prairieville and Tundra. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 518 and 522. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
